Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Hearing impairment 5% Microcephaly 5% Absent speech - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Choreoathetosis - Cortical visual impairment - Developmental regression - Developmental stagnation at onset of seizures - Failure to thrive - Feeding difficulties in infancy - Generalized tonic-clonic seizures - Global brain atrophy - Hyporeflexia of upper limbs - Irritability - Lower limb hyperreflexia - Muscular hypotonia - Myo
